Name: Waveshift
Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Resistance: -40%
Optimal Charge Window: +25%

Instability: +10%
Overcharge Rate: +50%
Shatter Damage: +50%

A unique sonic sensory chipset allows the WaveShift to reduce a deposit's resistance and increase its optimal charge window. While active, this attachment must be managed properly as the vibrations produced have been known to increase the chance of an explosion.
